title: [Large-scale] Language Proficiency Improvement Program Through Distributed Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Foreign Language Vocabulary and Grammar Proficiency
context.additional_context: Learners use mobile devices (smartphones/tablets) to study anytime/anywhere over a flexible 3-month period, with digital platform-delivered materials.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately recall over 80% of vocabulary learned through distributed practice during a 6-month post-assessment.
Learners can explain the mechanisms of long-term memory reinforcement using spaced repetition learning strategies.
Learners can autonomously establish self-directed study plans by setting personalized optimal review cycles.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
